name: v1_urllookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool url_lookup_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Lookup location information for any URL domain. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/urllookup.
API description: Queries the API Ninjas URL Lookup endpoint to retrieve information about a given URL.

url.description: The valid URL to check. It supports schemes (e.g. http://example.com) as well as schemeless (e.g. example.com) formats.
